comments.raw_text:
I don't know if things could be improved here, but selecting/deselecting a bunch of text can be rather slow from the LG Optimus Black.

In the totally zoomed out version of the testcase, I get a result of appr. 17s.

The stock Android browser seems to be completely lying about selecting text, it's not selecting anything. 
I'm using Android 2.2.2 on this phone. I wonder if newer Android versions do work on the testcase.
comments.creator: martijn.martijn@gmail.com
comments.author: martijn.martijn@gmail.com
